Package Database

Class JDBC

java.lang.Object
Database.JDBC
public class JDBC extends Object
This object is the middleware between the server and the SQL Database. Each method of this object should call a procedure which is defined in the actual DB, and also return an object or a list of objects whom handle the returned data.
Author:
Michail Panagiotis Bofos, Demetra Hadjicosti, Ioanna Theofilou, Lucía Jiménez García

      Returns:

    • insertAppointment

      public boolean insertAppointment​(int doctor_id, int patient_id, int clinic_id, String date, String time, int drop_in, int receptionist_id, int att)
      This method, inserts a new appointment into the database
      Parameters:
      doctor_id - Doctor ID
      patient_id - Patient ID
      clinic_id - Clinic ID
      date - Date
      time - Time
      drop_in - If it is drop in
      receptionist_id - Receptionist ID
      att - If it was attended or not
      Returns:
      true for successful insertion otherwise false
